FuncDef: The display vrrp6 state-change interface vrid command displays the changes in the status of a specified Virtual Router Redundancy Protocol for IPv6 (VRRP6) backup group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type and number of an interface on which a VRRP6 backup group is configured.
-

Specifies the type and number of an interface on which a VRRP6 backup group is configured.
-

Specifies the ID of a VRRP6 backup group.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display vrrp6 state-change interface gigabitethernet 1/0/1 vrid 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the status of a VRRP6 backup group is abnormal, run the display vrrp6 state-change interface vrid command to view the latest 10 changes in the status of the VRRP6 backup group. The changes include:
Time when the status of the VRRP6 backup group changedStatuses before and after the status of the VRRP6 backup group changedReason of the change in the status of the VRRP6 backup group
